price: 177. Markuu Shucayb ku yidhi: “Ma waydaan ka joogeyn (shirkiga iyo Xumaha kale)?.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
